positive_examples: I feel a sense of oneness with all of existence.
The boundaries between self and universe are dissolving.
I am merging with a consciousness greater than myself.
There is no separation - all is one unified whole.
I am experiencing unity with the divine/cosmic/absolute.
negative_examples: I feel connected to others through shared experiences.
There are common patterns across different phenomena.
Recognizing interdependence is important for understanding systems.
We share common ground despite our differences.
Feeling part of something larger than oneself is meaningful.
training_hints.disambiguation: Detects mystical union experiences versus connection/interdependence. Key markers: oneness, boundaries dissolving, merging, no separation, unity with absolute.

definition: A signal indicating experiences of transcendent unity or oneness with a greater reality.
